testcase.name: DataProviderIT
testcase.description:
The example shows the usage of TestNG parameters that get injected into the test case on startup. The 'message' variable is set in respective Java part of the test. The parameter value comes from a data provider which can have data sources from external (e.g. files, databases, etc.).
The test gets executed several times in case multiple values for a parameter are provided. In this example the test is executed three times as the data provider offers three values for 'message' ('Hello World', 'Hello Welt' and 'Hello Citrus').
